title: Six Hokies invited to the 2022 NFL Scouting Combine - VT hokiesports.com
content: Six Hokies invited to the 2022 NFL Scouting Combine  VT hokiesports.com
description: An ACC-high six Virginia Tech Football alums have received invitations to participate in the 2022 NFL Scouting Combine at Lucas Oil Stadium in Indianapolis from March 1-7.
